labels.name: A: In progress

issue.body:
### Issue URL (Anti Adblock Script) [http://youtube.com](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=http%3A%2F%2Fyoutube.com) ### Comment > This has only been an issue within the last couple days. The ads are still blocked, but now YouTube sees the adblocker is there. I’m unsure of if I will be able to play videos after taking this screenshot, but if it is blocked, I may be unable to watch YouTube on iPad until it’s fixed. ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/1vbkyfc6pgckk480sgs004wkgs0swssc7e3ughqvtc.jpg?nc=1)

issue.title: justblogbaby.com
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Ads) [https://justblogbaby.com/posts/las-vegas-raiders-chargers-2023-week-4-what-surprised-us-01hbr874qy71](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fjustblogbaby.com%2Fposts%2Flas-vegas-raiders-chargers-2023-week-4-what-surprised-us-01hbr874qy71) ### Comment > I previously sent a list of URLs via email, but only one of them (the ad on the home page) was resolved. As for the media player in the article, it was not resolved. However, sending the issue resolves it. So I create an issue. > > P.S. I check whether the issue I created has been resolved by accessing the website after a while. I haven't seen the issue page on Github. ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/ra24pnhnydwo00cck84ok04cwc44w4ggm9ad9z7gpw.png?nc=1)
Screenshot 2 ![Screenshot 2](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/f4hav9es1xwsks8cwo4gk4cso4cscwweyqolbxz8vc.png?nc=1)
